post.description:
Creates a new gas manager policy with the specified rules. Returns the policy id of 
a successfully created policy. The newly created policy will be in the ‚Äúinactive‚Äù status.

policyType.description: Type of the policy (e.g. "sponsorship"). Currently we support "sponsorship" (for EVM network policies) and "solana" (for Solana network policies).

appId.description:
ID for the app associated with the new policy.
Learn how to find your app ID [here](https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/notify-api-faq#where-can-i-find-the-app-id).

rules.description: Rules for "sponsorship" policy type. Empty if `policyType` is not "sponsorship".

maxSpendUsd.description: Maximum amount of USD that can be spent by the Gas Manager

maxSpendPerSenderUsd.description: Maximum amount of USD that can be spent by a single sender

maxSpendPerUoUsd.description: Maximum amount of USD that can be spent by a single user operation

maxCount.description: Maximum number of operations that can be sponsored through the policy

maxCountPerSender.description: Maximum number of operations that can be sponsored for a single sender through the policy

senderAllowlist.description: List of addresses that are allowed to send operations

senderBlocklist.description: List of addresses that are not allowed to send operations

startTimeUnix.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy starts

endTimeUnix.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy ends

sponsorshipExpiryMs.description: Milliseconds from signing that the sponsorship expires

webhookRules.description: Make a request to your server to verify sponsorship eligibility.

webhookUrl.description: The URL to call to verify sponsorship eligibility.

approveOnFailure.description: If true, the userOp will be sponsored in the event the request fails or times out.

solanaRules.description: Rules for "solana" policy type. Empty if `policyType` is not "solana".

maxSpendUsd.description: Maximum amount of USD that can be spent by the Gas Manager

maxSpendPerTxnUsd.description: Maximum amount of USD that can be spent per transaction

maxCount.description: Maximum number of transactions that can be sponsored through the policy

startTimeUnix.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy starts

endTimeUnix.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy ends

networks.description: List of networks the policy is active on

get.description: Returns all policies under an app. The results are paginated.

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: An optional app id to filter results by policies associated with that app. Learn how to find your app ID [here](https://docs.alchemy.com/reference/notify-api-faq#where-can-i-find-the-app-id).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: An optional parameter to limit the number of results per page.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: String - used for pagination. If there are previous results, `before` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the previous page.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: String - used for pagination. If more results are available `after` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the next page.

before.description: String - used for pagination. If there are previous results, `before` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the previous page. Can be null if there are no previous results.

after.description: String - used for pagination. If more results are available `after` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the next page. Can be null if there are no more results.

parameters.description: ID of the policy to be updated

status.description: The new status of the policy

get.description: Returns stats about a policy specified by ID, including signatures mined, signatures expired, signatures pending, USD mined, and USD pending.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the policy to be fetched

get.description: Returns a list of sponsorships associated with the specified policy ID. The results are paginated.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the policy for which sponsorships are being queried.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of sponsorships returned.

before.description: String - used for pagination. If there are previous results, `before` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the previous page. Can be null if there are no previous results.

after.description: String - used for pagination. If more results are available `after` field is returned in the response and can be passed in the request to fetch the next page. Can be null if there are no more results.

grantedAt.description: Unix timestamp of when the sponsorship was granted

confirmedTotalUsd.description: Total amount of USD that was spent. Can be null if the transaction has not been mined

status.description: Status of the sponsorship. Can be PENDING, MINED or EXPIRED

uoExplorerUrl.description: URL to the user operation explorer for the associated user operation

txnHash.description: Hash of the transaction associated with the sponsorship. Can be null if not mined

txnExplorerUrl.description: URL to the transaction explorer for the associated transaction. Can be null if not mined
